All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Abi
Application Binary Interface (ABI) for encoding/decoding smart contract function calls and events.
Abi.FunctionCall
 
Abi.FunctionMetadata
 
AbiBinding
Binds Java interface methods to ABI function metadata for type-safe contract interactions.
AbiDecoder
Decodes byte arrays into ABI types according to the Ethereum Contract ABI specification.
AbiDecodingException
Thrown when ABI outputs cannot be decoded.
AbiEncoder
Encodes ABI types into byte arrays according to the Ethereum Contract ABI specification.
AbiEncodingException
Thrown when ABI inputs cannot be encoded.
AbiType
Represents a Solidity type that can be encoded/decoded.
AccessListEntry
Entry in a transaction's access list, as defined by EIP-2930.
AccessListWithGas
Result of an access list creation request, containing the generated access list and the gas used.

Represents state overrides for an account during transaction simulation.
AccountOverride.Builder
Builder for AccountOverride.
Address
Hex-encoded 20-byte Ethereum address.
AddressType
Represents a Solidity address type for ABI encoding/decoding.

Modern, curated ANSI color palette for terminal output with automatic TTY detection.

Utility class providing access to Anvil's 10 default funded test accounts.

Represents a Solidity array (static T[N] or dynamic T[]).

Represents a token balance change during transaction simulation.
AssetToken
Represents a token in an asset change trace.
AssetValue

Blob
Represents an EIP-4844 blob - a fixed-size data blob used in blob transactions.
BlobDecoder
Decoder for extracting original data from EIP-4844 blobs.
BlobSidecar
Represents the sidecar data for EIP-4844 blob transactions.
BlobTransactionRequest
Request to submit an EIP-4844 blob transaction to the blockchain.

Represents a block header in the blockchain.
BlockTag
Represents block identifiers for Ethereum JSON-RPC calls.
BlockTag.Named
Named block tag (e.g., "latest", "pending", "earliest").
BlockTag.Number
Block number tag.
Bool
Represents a Solidity boolean (bool) type for ABI encoding/decoding.

Unified entry point for interacting with Ethereum/EVM blockchains.
Brane.Builder
Builder for creating Brane client instances.
Brane.Reader
Read-only client for blockchain queries.
Brane.Signer
Full-featured client with transaction signing capability.
Brane.Tester
Testing interface for interacting with test nodes (Anvil, Hardhat, Ganache).
BraneContract
Dynamic proxy-based contract binding system that maps Java interfaces to smart contracts.
BraneDebug
Global toggle for enabling verbose debug logging across Brane modules.
BraneException
Base runtime exception for all Brane SDK failures.
BraneExecutors
Factory methods for creating executors optimized for different workloads.
BraneMetrics
Interface for collecting metrics from the Brane RPC layer.
BraneMetrics.Noop
Private no-op implementation of BraneMetrics.
BraneProvider
Low-level abstraction for sending JSON-RPC requests to an Ethereum node.
BraneTxBuilderException
Runtime exception thrown when a transaction builder is in an invalid state.

Represents a Solidity bytes type (bytes or bytesN).

Eip712Type
Sealed interface representing all valid EIP-712 types.
Eip712Type.Address
Ethereum address type (20 bytes).
Eip712Type.Array
Array type with optional fixed length.
Eip712Type.Bool
Boolean type.
Eip712Type.DynamicBytes
Dynamic-length byte array type (bytes).
Eip712Type.FixedBytes
Fixed-length byte array type (bytes1, bytes2, ..., bytes32).
Eip712Type.Int
Signed integer type (int8, int16, ..., int256).
Eip712Type.String
Dynamic-length string type.
Eip712Type.Struct
Struct (custom composite) type.
Eip712Type.Uint
Unsigned integer type (uint8, uint16, ..., uint256).

High-performance ABI encoder that eliminates intermediate object allocations.

Abstract base class for fixed-size 48-byte G1 points on the BLS12-381 curve.
